pli-tv-pvr10:15.3:
[Vmv.5.335](): _Tatthevāti vassaṃvutthāya cārikaṃ
apakkamitvā tattheva nivāsanaṃ paṭicca paññattasikkhāpadaṃ_, “_Tattheva_: the training rule laid down because of not going wandering after completing the rainy-season residence, but staying right there.” This refers to _bhikkhunī-pācittiya_ 40.
